[[בְּ]]:[[בְּחֵל ]] in the shadow of a tree Ju Jdg 9:15, [[בְּחֵל מחריס]] Is 30:2; [[בָּהּ]] Is 14:32 in Zion, in gods De 32:37 (poem), elsewhere in God 2Sa 22:3 = Ps 18:3, Na 1:7, Ps 2:12, Ps 5:12, Ps 7:2, Ps 11:1, Ps 16:1, Ps 25:20, Ps 31:2, Ps 31:20, Ps 34:9, Ps 34:23, Ps 37:40, Ps 57:2, Ps 64:11, Ps 71:1, Ps 118:8, Ps 118:9, Ps 141:8, Ps 144:2, Is 57:13; [[חוסים בו]]([[כל ה]])[[מגן הוא ל]] a shield is he to (all) who seek refuge in him 2Sa 22:31 = Ps 18:31, Pr 30:5; ´[[בְּ]] is probably to be supplied in thought at least: [[מושׁיע חוסים]] Ps 17:7 saviour of those seeking refuge (in thee); [[חסה במותו חדיק]] Pr 14:32 a righteous man in his death seeketh refuge (in Yahweh), ´[[בשׁם י]] Zep 3:12, [[בחל כנפיךָ]] in the shadow of thy wings Ps 36:8, Ps 57:2; [[בסתר כנפיךָ]] Ps 61:5, [[תחת כנפיו]] under his wings Ps 91:4 = Ru 2:12.
